rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
退役橄榄球运动员的脑震荡与较高的神经退行性疾病生物标志物有关《国际分子科学杂志》上的一项研究表明，与非接触性运动参与者相比，有脑震荡史的退役橄榄球运动员与神经退行性疾病相关的生物标志物表现出显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/Concussions-in-retired-rugby-players-linked-to-higher-neurodogenic-disease-biomarkers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/Concussions-in-retired-rugby-players-linked-to-higher-neurodogenic-disease-biomarkers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ce68214-7a48-48f4-a79a-12910efe96ba Sun, 21 Jul 2024 21:08:00 -0400 Concussions in retired rugby players linked to higher neurodegenerative disease biomarkers
英国青少年的超加工食品消费趋势显示出地区和社会经济差异《欧洲营养杂志》的一项研究表明，英国青少年的超加工食品消费量因年龄、种族和社会经济地位而异，且不同地区存在显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/Ultra-processed-food-conspiration-trends-among-UK-adolescents-show-regional-and-socioeconomic-disparities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/Ultra-processed-food-conspiration-trends-among-UK-adolescents-show-regional-and-socioeconomic-disparities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a60f5e95-866e-4167-a61d-033c7754f5ac Sun, 21 Jul 2024 20:59:00 -0400 Ultra-processed food consumption trends among UK adolescents show regional and socioeconomic disparities
人工智能和成像技术的进步彻底改变了多发性硬化症的诊断《Translational Vision Science & Technology》中的一项研究表明，将人工智能与 IR-SLO 和 OCT 成像相结合可以改善多发性硬化症的自动诊断和分类。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/AI-and-imaging-advances-revolutionize-multiple-sclerosis-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/AI-and-imaging-advances-revolutionize-multiple-sclerosis-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b920ba6-f8ba-47b6-b058-698594fc409a Sun, 21 Jul 2024 20:47:00 -0400 AI and imaging advances revolutionize multiple sclerosis diagnosis
研究发现，减肥可以减少高度肥胖者的危险决定并改善情绪研究人员研究了高度肥胖者的显着体重减轻如何影响他们的新陈代谢、心理状态和决策过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/Weight-loss-reduces-risky-decisions-and-boosts-mood-in-highly-obese-individuals-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/Weight-loss-reduces-risky-decisions-and-boosts-mood-in-highly-obese-individuals-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=553c78a3-0bad-4e0f-9311-48634853e900 Sun, 21 Jul 2024 20:35:00 -0400 Weight loss reduces risky decisions and boosts mood in highly obese individuals, study finds
研究发现，成年早期肥胖与晚年不良心脏后果有关《欧洲心脏杂志》上发表的一项研究表明，成年早期或中期的脂肪积累会对 60-64 岁个体的心脏结构和功能产生不利影响，强调了一生中控制肥胖的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/Early-adulthood-obesity-linked-to-adverse-heart-outcomes-in-later-life-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/Early-adulthood-obesity-linked-to-adverse-heart-outcomes-in-later-life-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df4d9db1-7a78-45b4-bc75-320edf2b0e40 Sun, 21 Jul 2024 20:25:00 -0400 Early adulthood obesity linked to adverse heart outcomes in later life, study finds
研究发现，新冠疫情大流行提高了美国家庭的食物多样性和饮食质量COVID-19 大流行导致美国家庭食物多样性和饮食质量暂时提高，家庭食品购买行为显着改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/COVID-pandemic-boosted-food-diversity-and-diet-quality-in-US-households-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240721/COVID-pandemic-boosted-food-diversity-and-diet-quality-in-US-households-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b027fc0-0974-426d-ab57-74957cb00efd Sun, 21 Jul 2024 20:10:00 -0400 COVID pandemic boosted food diversity and diet quality in U.S. households, study finds
加州大学洛杉矶分校选择在新的医疗保险替代支付模式下领导痴呆症护理加州大学洛杉矶分校已被医疗保险和医疗补助服务中心 (CMS) 选择参与新的医疗保险替代支付模式，该模式旨在支持痴呆症患者及其护理人员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/UCLA-chosen-to-lead-dementia-care-under-new-Medicare-alternative- payment-model.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/UCLA-chosen-to-lead-dementia-care-under-new-Medicare-alternative- payment-model.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c6a7ef7-ba7c-4e68-909e-7d5207a03c4b Fri, 19 Jul 2024 22:58:00 -0400 UCLA chosen to lead dementia care under new Medicare alternative payment model
研究证实联合化疗治疗睾丸癌的成功率很高一项新的研究表明，通过结合不同的化疗药物，即使一线治疗失败后，睾丸癌仍然是高度可治疗的并且通常是可以治愈的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Study-confirms-high-success-rates-of-combined-chemotherapy-in-treating-testular-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Study-confirms-high-success-rates-of-combined-chemotherapy-in-treating-testular-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a900a91b-bfe8-48e5-9eab-a5468bc4456a Fri, 19 Jul 2024 22:48:00 -0400 Study confirms high success rates of combined chemotherapy in treating testicular cancer
研究发现，新的 COVID-19 变体中的高突变计数不会增加免疫逃避北卡罗来纳大学夏洛特分校预测健康和环境风险的计算智能中心 (CIPHER) 的新研究发现，导致 COVID-19 的两种最近流行的病毒株：SARS-CoV-2 变种 BA.2.86 和 JN.1，尽管与 Omicron 相比具有大量突变，但它们在逃避免疫反应和引起感染方面并没有比其前身 Omicron 明显更好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/High-mutation-count-in-new-COVID-19-variants-does-not-increase-immune-evasion-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/High-mutation-count-in-new-COVID-19-variants-does-not-increase-immune-evasion-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4362276c-ba9b-45a4-99a3-0bd2f787aaa9 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 22:40:00 -0400 High mutation count in new COVID-19 variants does not increase immune evasion, study finds
新型电子烟产品可能会将尼古丁成瘾与游戏障碍联系起来在《烟草控制》杂志上发表的一篇“行业观察”研究论文中，加州大学河滨分校的两位科学家对配备触摸屏、动画显示屏和内置游戏的新型电子烟产品发出了警报。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/New-electronic-香烟-products-may- Couple-nicotine-addiction-with-gaming-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/New-electronic-香烟-products-may- Couple-nicotine-addiction-with-gaming-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3071d79-9afe-4229-9c31-f662ad02cac9 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 22:32:00 -0400 New electronic cigarette products may couple nicotine addiction with gaming disorder
